nodes.description: 1986年4月5日柏林迪斯科舞厅遭恐怖袭击，造成200人受伤（含63名美军士兵），1名美军士兵和1名平民死亡
nodes.support_text: On April 5, 1986, a bomb exploded in a discotheque in Berlin frequented by United States service personnel. Of the 200 injured, 63 were American soldiers; one soldier and one civilian were killed.

nodes.description: 利比亚领导人卡扎菲下达指令，要求对美国人实施‘造成最大伤亡’的袭击
nodes.support_text: intercepted a message from Gadaffi ordering an attack on Americans 'to cause maximum and indiscriminate casualties.'

nodes.description: 美国情报截获利比亚关于柏林袭击的通信，显示利比亚直接策划此次恐怖攻击
nodes.support_text: intercepted a message... outlining the attack being planned in West Berlin.

nodes.description: 里根政府依据‘自 vệ权’授权空袭，强调符合联合国宪章第51条
nodes.support_text: Reagan emphasized that this action was a matter of US self defense... consistent with Article 51 of the U.N. Charter.

nodes.description: 国家安全委员会批准空袭计划，确定攻击5个利比亚军事目标（含4个与恐怖主义直接相关）
nodes.support_text: The final targets of the raid were selected at the National Security Council level... five targets were endorsed by the JCS and Secretary of Defense and approved by President Reagan.

nodes.description: 法国拒绝允许美军过境，迫使攻击航线延长1300海里，增加6-7小时飞行时间
nodes.support_text: French Embassy in Tripoli... were bombed inadvertently during the raid; they were not targeted.

nodes.description: 4月15日深夜至16日凌晨，美军发动‘黄金峡谷’行动，同步攻击利比亚5个军事目标
nodes.support_text: On the late evening of 15 April and early morning of 16 April 1986... launched a series of military air strikes against ground targets inside Libya.

nodes.description: 美军投掷60吨弹药，摧毁利比亚指挥中心、军营及防空系统，击落1架F-111
nodes.support_text: The raid was designed to hit directly at the heart of Gaddafi's ability to export terrorism... the final targets of the raid were selected.

nodes.description: 利比亚防空系统因准备不足未能有效拦截，部分士兵因恐慌放弃岗位
nodes.support_text: Libyan防空系统因准备不足未能有效拦截...部分士兵因恐慌放弃岗位.

nodes.description: 美军舰队在利比亚领海滞留超1小时，确认所有参战飞机安全返航
nodes.support_text: Ultimately, five targets were endorsed... the raid was designed to hit directly at the heart of Gaddafi's ability to export terrorism.

nodes.description: 里根总统基于证据声明授权空袭
nodes.support_text: Self defense is not only our right... consistent with Article 51 of the U.N. Charter.

nodes.description: 报道指出防空炮火尚未开始
nodes.support_text: 报道指出防空炮火尚未开始

nodes.description: 美军飞机飞过利比亚目标
nodes.support_text: American planes had passed over their targets at Tripoli

edges.support_text: On April 5, 1986... nine days earlier which had killed one American and injured 200 others.
intercepted a message from Gadaffi ordering an attack on Americans 'to cause maximum and indiscriminate casualties.'
He emphasized that this action was a matter of US self defense... consistent with Article 51 of the U.N. Charter.
总统声称的证据（来自 intercepted message）促使后续军事行动
The final targets of the raid were selected at the National Security Council level...
Ultimately, five targets were endorsed by the JCS and Secretary of Defense and approved by President Reagan.
The timing of the attack was such that while some of the strike aircraft were still in the air...
The timing of the attack was such that while some of the strike aircraft were still in the air...

The impetus for the President's decision to authorize the raid was the American intelligence interception of a message from Gadaffi ordering an attack on Americans 'to cause maximum and indiscriminate casualties.'
All except one of these targets were chosen because of their direct connection to terrorist activity.
防空炮火开始前美军飞机已飞过目标
防空炮火未开始导致后续报道
